# CITTAA Psychologist Report Templates

## Overview
This folder contains fillable PDF templates for psychologists to submit their daily, weekly, and monthly reports to CITTAA Health Services.

## Available Templates

### ðŸ“„ Daily Report Template
**File:** `CITTAA_Daily_Report_Template.pdf`

**Use for:** Daily counseling session documentation

**Sections:**
- Basic Information (name, email, school, date)
- Sessions Conducted Today (time, student, grade, type, duration)
- Key Observations
- Interventions Applied
- Follow-up Actions Required
- Risk Assessment
- Parental Communication
- Total Session Time

**Submission Deadline:** Same day by 5:00 PM IST

---

### ðŸ“„ Weekly Report Template
**File:** `CITTAA_Weekly_Report_Template.pdf`

**Use for:** Weekly summary of counseling activities

**Sections:**
- Basic Information
- Week Overview (Monday to Friday)
- Weekly Statistics (sessions, students, consultations)
- Key Cases Summary (anonymized)
- Trends and Patterns Observed
- Challenges Faced This Week
- Successes and Achievements
- Recommendations for Next Week
- Resource Needs

**Submission Deadline:** Sunday by 6:00 PM IST

---

### ðŸ“„ Monthly Report Template
**File:** `CITTAA_Monthly_Report_Template.pdf`

**Use for:** Comprehensive monthly counseling summary

**Sections:**
- Basic Information
- Month Overview
- Monthly Statistics (comprehensive metrics)
- Case Distribution by Category
- Key Achievements This Month
- Challenges and Concerns
- Program Initiatives and Activities
- Recommendations for Next Month
- Professional Development Activities
- Resource Utilization and Needs
- Goals for Next Month

**Submission Deadline:** 28th of each month, End of Day

---

## How to Use

### Step 1: Download Template
1. Click on the appropriate template file above
2. Download the PDF to your computer

### Step 2: Fill Out the Template
1. Open the PDF in Adobe Acrobat Reader, Preview, or any PDF reader
2. Fill in all required fields
3. Provide detailed, professional responses
4. Save the completed PDF with a descriptive filename

**Recommended filename format:**
```
[SchoolName]_[ReportType]_[Date].pdf

Examples:
- GreenwoodHigh_Daily_2025-11-06.pdf
- RiversideAcademy_Weekly_2025-11-03.pdf
- OakwoodSchool_Monthly_2025-10-31.pdf
```

### Step 3: Submit the Report
1. Go to the submission portal: [Psychologist Report Upload](https://cittaahealthservices.github.io/CittaaHealthServices/psychologist-report-upload.html)
2. Fill in the form fields:
   - Report Type (Daily/Weekly/Monthly)
   - Your Name
   - Your Email (@cittaa.in)
   - School Name
   - Submission Date
3. Upload your completed PDF file
4. Click "Submit Report"

### Step 4: Confirmation
- You will receive an email confirmation after submission
- Reports are automatically analyzed by AI for quality
- High-quality reports (score â‰¥95) are auto-approved
- Reports needing review (score 85-94) are sent to info@cittaa.in
- Reports requiring revision (score <85) will receive feedback

---

## Quality Guidelines

### âœ… Best Practices

**Completeness:**
- Fill in ALL sections of the template
- Provide specific details, not generic statements
- Include measurable data where applicable
- Document all interventions and outcomes

**Clinical Quality:**
- Use professional terminology
- Maintain confidentiality (anonymize student data)
- Provide evidence-based interventions
- Document risk assessments thoroughly

**Documentation:**
- Write clearly and concisely
- Use proper grammar and spelling
- Include dates and times
- Maintain consistent formatting

**Compliance:**
- Submit reports on time
- Follow CITTAA protocols
- Adhere to ethical guidelines
- Maintain professional standards

### âŒ Common Mistakes to Avoid

- Leaving sections blank or incomplete
- Using vague or generic descriptions
- Missing submission deadlines
- Forgetting to anonymize student information
- Not documenting risk factors
- Skipping follow-up actions
- Incomplete session details

---

## Scoring Criteria

Reports are evaluated on a 100-point scale across four dimensions:

### 1. Completeness (25 points)
- All required sections filled
- Sufficient detail provided
- No missing information

### 2. Clinical Quality (35 points)
- Professional terminology used
- Evidence-based interventions documented
- Appropriate risk assessment
- Clear clinical reasoning

### 3. Documentation Standards (25 points)
- Clear and organized writing
- Proper grammar and spelling
- Consistent formatting
- Professional presentation

### 4. Compliance (15 points)
- Timely submission
- Confidentiality maintained
- Ethical guidelines followed
- CITTAA protocols adhered to

**Score Thresholds:**
- **95-100:** Excellent - Auto-approved
- **85-94:** Good - Manual review by quality team
- **Below 85:** Needs improvement - Revision required

---

- Form submission errors

- Report content
- Clinical documentation
- Intervention strategies

Contact: **sairam@cittaa.in**

---

## Privacy & Confidentiality

âš ï¸ **Important Reminders:**

- **Never include** student names in reports (use IDs or "Student A/B/C")
- **Never include** identifying information that could breach confidentiality
- **Always anonymize** case examples and scenarios
- **Secure your files** - do not share reports outside CITTAA systems
- **Delete local copies** after successful submission (reports are stored in Google Drive)

All submitted reports are:
- Stored securely in Google Drive
- Accessible only to authorized CITTAA staff
- Shared with school management (school-specific folders only)
- Protected by HIPAA-compliant security measures

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Can I edit the PDF template?**  
A: Yes, you can fill in the fields. Do not modify the structure or remove sections.

**Q: What if I miss a deadline?**  
A: Submit as soon as possible and include a note explaining the delay.

**Q: Can I submit handwritten reports?**  
A: No, all reports must be typed and submitted as PDF files.

**Q: What if I don't have data for a section?**  
A: Write "N/A" or "Not applicable" rather than leaving it blank.

**Q: How long are reports stored?**  
A: Reports are stored indefinitely in Google Drive for record-keeping and compliance.

**Q: Who can access my reports?**  
A: Only CITTAA leadership, quality team, and your school's management team.

**Q: Can I submit multiple reports at once?**  
A: No, submit each report separately through the web form.

**Q: What file size limit is there?**  
A: Maximum 10MB per PDF file.
